# Academic Bio

Hello, I'm an *applied statistician*. In a broader sense, I'm also a
*data scientist* because I do data analysis, and I do research on the
methodology and computational aspects of data analysis. I'm an
enthusiastic *R user and package developer*.

I'm also serving as Associate Editor for 
[Journal of Statistical Software](https://www.jstatsoft.org){target="_blank"}
and 
[Statistics and Computing](https://www.springer.com/journal/11222){target="_blank"}.

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="55%"}
## Interests

-   Mixture models
-   Model-based clustering and classification
-   Data science
-   Statistical machine learning
-   Dimension reduction methods and regression graphics
-   Genetic and evolutionary algorithms
:::

# Software {#software}

I'm the author and/or maintainer of several packages and functions written in [R](http://www.r-project.org/){target="_blank"}, a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics, using 
[RStudio](http://www.rstudio.com/ide/){target="_blank"}, an integrated development environment (IDE) for R.

{{< iconify fa6-solid laptop-code >}}    A collection of R packages for [statistical modeling using Gaussian mixtures](https://mclust-org.github.io/index.html){target="_blank"}.

{{< iconify fa-brands r-project >}}    List of [R packages and functions](./software/index.html).
